phrases: A neutral country of 17 million people.
It is a world of magic.
Magic is bought and sold there every day.
It is an integral part of people's lives.
And there are those who use magic as their occupation.
Those people are referred to as wizards.
The wizards belong to various guilds and perform jobs on commission.
There are a large number of guilds within the country.
And in a certain city there lies a certain guild.
A guild from which various legends were once born...
Or rather, will continue to be born long into the future...
I will gather all the light, and shine down on your tomorrow!
Until your heart can hear it...
Are you sure you are not forgetting something?
When you are not here to make me laugh,
even what I am looking for cannot be found.
Snowing, be honest with yourself and smile,
because when two people lay close, time overlaps.
I will gather all the light, and shine down on your tomorrow!
I knew you would come, you Fairy Tail flies!
What are you after, you fiend?
What do you plan to do with the lullaby?
The station is surrounded by wind...
You fools cannot escape from here.
I said we do not know already...
There is no way we could dispel the magic wind wall!
Eisenwald's real objective is the town down the line from here!
It is the place where the old men are having their regular meeting!
They plan on using the lullaby there!
So that is what you are planning?
But this station is surrounded by a magic wind wall.
You will be mincemeat if you try and force yourself out.
I am well aware of that...
But while we are sitting here, Erigor gets ever closer to where the Guild Masters are.
There should be someone they call Kage in Eisenwald.
He was the only one who was able to dispel Lullaby's seal.
Then he could dispel the magic wind wall, too!
Search for Kage and capture him!
Karacka, how long are you going to hide yourself there?
I am useless as backup in a fight.
No, I have a much simpler task for you.
I have completely lost sight of him.
Hey, why do not we head back to where Erza is for now?
Erza told us to go after him.
You would ignore an order from Erza?
After the things she will do to you, Lucy, I am not sure I could look at you...
She is going to do things to me?!
I will keep looking until I find him!
Your attitude sure changes easily, Lucy.
And why is this cat even following me anyway?
Has this guy never heard of a door?
Well, I suppose there is no problem if I just leave him alone.
But I would not be satisfied with that, would I?
Thanks for earlier, you motion-sickness fly!
I am not bald, and my name's not Hage!
I basically understand your magic now.
You ingest flames to increase your destructive power.
I really really want to slug you one right now, but it is not the time for that!
Maybe I will tell you if you beat me.
You will tell me after I hit you?
Then that is two birds with one stone!
I am all fired up now.
You cannot dodge my Orochi Shadow!
They will follow you into the depths of hell!
Wing Slash of the Fire Dragon!
Y-You have got to be kidding me?
He destroyed the Orochi Shadow with a single attack?
I cannot believe a wizard like this exists!
How did you like another one of my fly punches, eh?
Oh my, it seems I have gone and destroyed the place again.
Why does it always end up like this?
Tell me where Erigor is, like you promised!
Master Erigor is no longer in this station.
I did not do nothing but I am sorry!
Dispel the magic wind wall, and do not give us any trouble!
You are the only one who can dispel the magic wind wall!
Was not he an ally in the same guild as you?!
So that is what your guild is like?
Kage, you have got to stay with us!
It is no use, Erza, he is unconscious.
He cannot use magic in that sort of condition.
We must force him to do it!
A deep gorge that stretches all the way into the depths of the land.
There is no way to cross it other than this railway.
The town of Clover where the Guild Masters are assembled is near.
And I have recovered most of the magic power that I used creating that magic wind wall.
You fools who took away our jobs and our rights...
The death god will purge you!
So Erigor's objective was the regular meeting?
Erigor blocked the only route to Clover, and is heading there by air.
It would be possible to catch up to him in a magic 4 wheeler,
but if we do not do something about this magic wind wall we cannot leave the station!
If we try and escape to the outside, that is what happens.
I will tear this wall to shreds!
Force is not going to help.
It will be bad if we do not hurry!
Cannot you freeze it with your magic?
If I could do that, I would have done it already.
You are going to smash yourself to pieces!
I was able to transport between places by going through the Spirit world at the Everlue mansion, remember?
Well, a normal person would die if they did that.
And anyway, the gate can only open where the Celestial wizard is.
In other words, if you wanted to pass through the spirit world to escape,
the least you would need is a Celestial wizard outside the station.
Just hurry up and do it.
And it is also a really big violation of the contract for a human to enter the Spirit World.
It is sure a good thing that it was Everlue's key when it happened last time.
The thing I was talking about when we came here!
You mean when you kept calling me weird?
You cannot just go stealing things!
But Virgo herself said to give it to you!
We do not have time to waste on this pointless crap.
She said that since Everlue was arrested, his contract was broken.
So she visited us and said she wanted to contract with you, Lucy.
I should be happy, but this is not really the time, you know?
We have got to think of a way out of here.
Little kitties should sit there quietly and meow!
She can be pretty scary sometimes.
She is way stronger than you would think!
But, Virgo can dig holes in the ground.
I was thinking we could escape from the magic wind wall by digging underneath it...
Why did not you say something earlier?
I will give you a reward later, I will!
Anyway, just give me the key!
I am linked to the path to the world of Celestial Spirits!
O Spirit, answer my call and pass through the Gate!
Gate of the Maiden, I open thee!
Hey Marco, you really slimmed down.
I apologize for the trouble I caused you earlier.
I am a Celestial Spirit that is faithful to her master.
I perform my duties in the appearance my master wishes.
You seemed a lot more powerful and forceful before, though.
I shall return to this form.
Why did you have to go and say that?
Anyway, we do not have any time.
Can we postpone the contract until later?
Stop calling me Master already, would you?
Then shall I call you Queen?
So that is her thing, huh?
Having him die after I fought with him'll leave a bad taste in my mouth.
You will never be able to catch up now.
Just you wait, you old geezers!
How do you like Happy's max speed?!
Thanks to you I was able to catch up to him.
Why did you take me with you?
So we are going to take you to a doctor in Clover.
No... I mean, why did you save me?
You plan on using me as a human bargaining chip with Erigor.
He is as cold blooded as they come.
He would not do a thing for me.
If you want to die, just say the word.
Everything does not have to be decided by life and death, you know.
Think about the future a little, will you?
Do not shove your big ass in my face!
Hey, do not make light of my words of wisdom!
It seems I truly have used up too much magic power.
It is up to you until we get there!
I will incinerate that dangerous flute!
You broke out from the magic wind wall?
He jumps and punches with flames?
I would never think a wizard could punch like that!
Stop flutterin' around up there, it are not fair!
Get down here and fight like a man!
It is no use, I do not have enough magic power.
It is called a Purple Flare.
It can do lots of things other than just burning stuff.
You can change the properties of the fire.
If you wish it from your heart, the fire will respond naturally to your will.
And if you do that then fire will not lose to water or wind...
Change the properties of the fire, huh?
You must be cold being all naked like that.
How about I warm you up?
I do not see you wearing a parka, either!
So this is what a Fairy Tail wizard is like?
It seems I underestimated your power a bit.
How about we get serious now?
Now you have gone and wrapped yourself in something annoying!
I will tear it to shreds!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
Without wrapping yourself in those flames, you do not have that destructive power.
Looks like it is no longer effective.
The Storm Mail's winds constantly blow outward.
Flames can stand up to a headwind!
Let us ride on a tin horse, just the two of us.
It is sad that my beloved doll cannot talk to me...
Every time I think of you tears start to flow...
I am a crybaby, are not I?
In the moon (the moon) at night (at night)
I am at a loss for words (Hey!
so much it is like I am under a spell.
from which I will never awaken.
I am at a loss for words (Hey!
since I have completely fallen in love.
I wonder what spell I could chant,
I just love you like crazy!
One day I want to be able to tell you
There is nothing more to say!
Do not you think we balance each other out nicely?
Feels to me like the best team in all of Fairy Tail.
Now we will just do a bunch of jobs, and I will be famous in no time!
Then the only question is how many cities this team will destroy... 2, maybe 3?
